original_text: Jesus, knowing all that was going to happen to him, went out and asked them, “Who is it you want?”
korean_text: 예수께서 그 당할 일을 다 아시고 나아가 이르시되 너희가 누구를 찾느냐

sentences.original_text: Jesus, knowing all that was going to happen to him,
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 자기에게 일어날 모든 일을 아시고,
